title: What happened to (new client I think) status messages?
body: They don't save them now? I need to change it to a certain thing every time I log in now? I haven't tried on the old client but I remember it used to save forever...

replies.body: It's more than likely a bug with the new client, and your best bet is to submit it as such with the report a bug feature in the client. I'm experiencing this as well so it isn't just you. I think it likely it can't save messages properly between legacy and new client (When it was still alpha you could have two separate status messages dependent on which client you had open, so it seems likely to me that the merging of the clients is what has caused this issue.

I hope it's a bug, I hope it wasn't an intentional change :/
I want to uhh, 'express' who I main ;)

Not an intentional change certainly, just something that has likely been pushed to the sidelines for now in favour of higher priority features like missing store functions, RGM, item sets and the like. It may also fix on it's own once the full release rolls out, who knows.

Yeah it's definitely much lower on the priority list.......to come to think of it, I may have just found a bug that is the actual lowest on the priority list xD
Sent it through to them anyway though, good to let them know :P
